CustomField.description:
Require this field on the Prospect account. Then use a workflow to convert this selection to the proper code for the Segment (F, P, M, L). This is the code that comes in from DW on Customer Accounts. Not required on 3PL prospects, as there is no matching Segment for them.
Any changes to the picklist values should be coordinated with Brainshark administration and should also be made on the following objects - Vendor Detail, Opportunity, Contact, Lead, Work Orders.
1/29/18 - AL - Made this an unrestriced picklist because it was causing validation errors when converting to existing accounts
CustomField.label: Prospect Segment
